title: Katie Price to 'confront' Jane Pountney over torrid affair with Kieran Hayler in her brand new reality show - Irish Mirror Online
text:
Showbiz Katie Price to 'confront' Jane Pountney over torrid affair with Kieran Hayler in her brand new reality show The ITV star's marriage almost came to an end when she discovered that her husband and her best friend had cheated Share Katie's got a new show (Photo: Getty/Splash) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Katie Price is set to return to reality television thanks to her brand new show. 
The Loose Women star, who appeared in an array of TV shows with her former husband Peter Andre, is plotting a comeback. 
While details are scarce about the new series, reports are claiming that Katie plans to pull out all the stops in order to draw in big ratings. 
Viewers will apparently see Katie confronting her former best pal, Jane Pountney, who the ex-glamour model shunned from her life after discovering that she was having an affair with Kieran Hayler. Katie is working on a new show She plans to confront ex-best friend Jane Pountney (Photo: Twitter/@MissKatiePrice) 
"Katie’s got a new reality show in production and they’re already filming," an insider told Heat. 
"She plans to go to Jane’s house with the camera crew, knock on her door and confront her on camera. She’ll ask why she betrayed their friendship and if it was worth it. Jane had an affair with Kieran Hayler (Photo: Fame Flynet) 
"She wants everything to come out on the show – Katie thinks it’ll be a big ratings-grabber!" 
While Katie's ITV2 shows featured Peter prominently, her hubby Kieran will apparently take a back seat this time around. 
"Katie’s saying she’ll leave Kieran at home for that trip! The show isn’t like the ITV2 programmes she did with Pete, it’s more focussed on Katie with Kieran as her sidekick." 
Despite claiming she would always hold a grudge about the affair, Katie recently told Loose Women that her thoughts had changed. Katie and Kieran are happier than ever (Photo: officialkatieprice/Instagram) 
She confessed: "I trust him and for our wedding anniversary this year, I always said 'I never forgive, I never forget'. 
"I have now actually said to him 'I now forgive you, I do forget' because I got to a point where I don't have to worry about him. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
